scripts.deployDev: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local NODE_OPTIONS='-r dotenv/config' serverless deploy --stage dev
scripts.invokeBirthday: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local NODE_OPTIONS='-r dotenv/config' serverless invoke local -f birthday --env dev
scripts.invokeWorkload: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local NODE_OPTIONS='-r dotenv/config' serverless invoke local -f workload
scripts.invokeWorkloadAll: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local NODE_OPTIONS='-r dotenv/config' serverless invoke local -f workloadAll
scripts.invokeCompletionNotice: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local NODE_OPTIONS='-r dotenv/config' serverless invoke local -f completionNotice
